name: Dodge this !
description:
Survive one minute by blocking all the incoming bullets with your mouse controlled shield !

The bullets will arrive at an increasing rate !

Reload the game to try again.

Made for Trijam 155 under 2h52. Theme was 'Gameplay under 1 minute".

Was hoping to add more features but still happy it is working.

Made with Unity and Bolt.

Heart sprite: https://pixabay.com/illustrations/pixel-heart-heart-pixel-symbol-red-2779422/

Materials: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vehicles/land/cars-in-colors-endless-co...

Music: https://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music/track/the-duel
